# /aiaw-self-pivot-work

Revise scope and plan when requirements change or the current approach isn't working.

Use this command when working **on** the AI-Assisted Work repository (not when using it as a submodule).

## Instructions

**Read and follow the full agent instructions at:**

`agents/work-management/pivot-work.md`

Also read the supporting documentation:
- `agents/work-management/README.md` - Core concepts
- `agents/work-management/AGENTS.md` - Agent rules
